results.title: Laugh Iron On Patch - No Sew - Felt - You Pick the Color
results.description:
Add a joyous touch to anything fabric with the laugh iron on patch.

The patch measures 8.9"W x 3"H. No sewing is required...just you and your iron! Full instructions are included.

Would you also like the words "live" and "love"? Make it a set! Check out the "Words" section of the shop for the "Live Laugh Love" patch set and save $.35 versus buying them individually!

results.title: Live Laugh Love Iron On Patch - No Sew - Felt - You Pick the Color - Set of 3
results.description:
Add a special touch to anything fabric with the live laugh love iron on patch set.

The live patch measures 5.8"W x 2.4"H. The laugh patch measures 8.9"W x 3"H. The love patch measures 6.3"W x 2.4"H. No sewing is required...just you and your iron! Full instructions are included.

Would you like just one or two of these words instead? Check out the "Words" section of the shop to purchase them individually!

results.title: Printable Art Instant Download Live Love Laugh Art Print Eucalyptus Print Quote Print
results.description:
Welcome!

I am so pleased to offer beautiful printable wall art that will nicely compliment your decor at home or your office. I offer many coordinating pieces so you can decorate with multiple pictures, at a super affordable price! 

It's as easy as Print...Frame...Hang on the wall!

I also have a large variety of printables with customized monogram letters, names and dates.  You will be able to specify what you would like to print and I will adjust the file and send to your email within 48 hours (usually quicker), separate from any other pieces you may have purchased, which you will have instant access to.

You will have immediate access to your downloads as soon as payment is processed through Etsy (usually takes a few moments at most).

You can then: 
--Print on your own printer
--Upload to a printing service online 
or, --Take to a local print/copy shop of your choice
*Please note that the quality of your printed piece will only be as good 
as the paper and ink used to print it.

You will receive 2 files in your download.  
All files are high resolution JPG, at 300dpi.

The files include:
- 8x10 
- 11x14
In the case of a square format, you will receive:
- 10x10
- 12X12

The files can be easily used to print out many different sizes.  If you need assistance with re-sizing, I can send you a separate edited file via email, free of charge.  I can also assist if you need a different format than JPG.

Once you purchase the files through the Etsy checkout, you will be able to access your files by going to "You" at the top of the page, "Purchases and Reviews", then scroll to the transaction.  There is a button labeled 'Download", just click and you will receive your downloadable files!  They will always be stored there for you, in your account.

This listing is for a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD, no actual product will be shipped to you.

Artwork/Graphics by: https://www.etsy.com/shop/AnnelyBlooms

All of my files are for Personal use only! Print as many as you'd like for yourself and gifts.  

No commercial use is granted.  The designs are copyrighted to Laura Pacino.
Please, no reselling or sharing of the actual files!

I hope that you will find my shop to be fun, inspiring, and beautiful.  My desire is to make the world a bit more beautiful and comforting each and every day!

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Mug
results.description:
Family matters, and sometimes you have to make your own. Remember you are absolutely worth it, so take your place in the world with pride.

Whether you're drinking your morning coffee, evening tea, or something in between – this mug's for you! It's sturdy and glossy with a vivid print that'll withstand the microwave and dishwasher.

• Ceramic
• Dishwasher and microwave safe

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love with hearts design Painted Hanging/Desk Ornament lamp, Glass globe w/ battery fairy string lights
results.description:
Each night light is crafted and designed by hand to be unique. A simple lamp with an artistic graphic and a light strand to decorate your home or office. Made from a sturdy acrylic material this lamp can be placed either inside or outside! 

This lamp comes already assembled and features battery powered fairy lights (up to 48 hours of battery life). Then, find a sturdy surface or hang from the wall and enjoy the basking glow. This item can be used with any light source from a lamp or even the sun!

It's a simple and fun way to decorate any room! All lamps are hand-made, painted and assembled to ensure the best quality possible.

Quick and easy FREE SHIPPING! Any questions, comments or ideas, you're encouraged to ask! This product is meant to be fun and entertaining for you and all your guests!

**Note: this product uses battery powered fairy lights which can last up to 48 hrs. You might have to be creative and use a more permanent light source!

results.description:
Live Laugh Poop

Cover Photo shown is Jacobean.

You are the author of your living space, it should tell your story. Our sizes are perfect for decorating a tiered tray, freestanding on a shelf or sitting on your work desk. Our inventory is large and we're forever producing more. Bog Road Designs offers Frame Stain choices to allow the buyer the ability to match their home (found within the photo section).

Don’t forget to check out our other phrases!

Once your product is shipped, an email is sent with your TRACKING # and INFORMATION. You are able to see an estimation of how many days remaining prior to shipment.

Comes from a smoke-free environment.

**Each framed piece is sold separately (all other decor is not included).
A sawtooth hanger can be placed upon request in the notes section at checkout.

NOTE to buyer: We paint our products, no vinyl. Everything is homemade, no two pieces are alike. Measurements may vary up to 1 inch and we like to keep the characteristics in the wood (grain, knots, cracks, etc) and embrace their natural beauty. We use good judgement based on the imperfections and design layout to achieve satisfaction with each piece. BRD is not responsible for any bodily injury (splinters, hanging malfunctions, etc). We would never release something we wouldn’t put in our own home.

**We paint our products, no vinyl.

Customized pieces will be proof read by you (via your choice of contact) prior to painting to double check spelling, dates, etc. 

**STAY CONNECTED**
FAVORITE us to keep up on the latest items

results.title: Neon Colored Beaded Keychain or Rearview Mirror Hanger, Car Accessory, Peace Sign Keychain
results.description:
Neon Colored Beaded Keychain or Rearview Mirror Hanger, Car Accessory, Peace Sign Keychain

This item is a handmade beaded keychain or car mirror hanger.  You can use it for what you would like, even a purse decoration, zipper pull charm, rearview mirror dangle.
These bright neon beads are 6mm and 8mm in size, the clear ab shiny beads are size 4mm.  The orange peace sign is made of natural turquoise, and measures 14mm.  The silver charm is 19mm and says live, laugh, love.  The total length is 8.75 inches long from top of metal to very bottom of charm.
This item will be ship packed with bubble wrap and a padded envelope.
There are 5 of these available, if you require more please message me.

All signs are handmade and will differ slightly from sign to sign.

If you would like to request an alteration to the product shown, please contact us BEFORE purchasing. Also, we love to collaborate! So if you would like a custom order, please, don't hesitate to ask. Thank you!

DISCLAIMER:
We don't deal in perfection, so nicks/knots in the wood or a little gap in the frame is to be expected here and there. But we like it that way! Character is better than perfection, but we still guarantee a beautiful, functional piece handcrafted with care.

SHIPPING:
All of our signs are made to order and will ship 3 to 7 business days after purchase. Customers are responsible for shipping costs, but a refund will be given if the cost to ship turns out to be less than what was originally paid.

results.title: Live Well - Laugh Often - Love Much (set of 3) shelf sitter wood block signs
results.description:
LIVE WELL
LAUGH OFTEN
LOVE MUCH
set of 3 sign blocks - they are 2'' x 9" - 2" x 10" - 2 x 11 1/2"
Shown in black with rusty stars accents

THIS LITTLE SET OF 3 SIGNS IS MADE TO ORDER. Orders are currently taking up to 14 days from date of payment.

All my signs are hand painted myself, and are uniquely different than others.
I use a 7 step process, starting with a special textured blend base coat, then paint top coat. After sanding, the special texture shows through giving the sign a beautiful distressed finish. 

All signs are detailed with a black distressed edge, and  finished with a coat of stain.
I use 3/4" pine.

results.title: Funny Live Laugh Love Quote Prints, Minimalistic Above Bed Art, Inspirational Quotes Typography Wall Art, Bedroom Decor and Dorm Decor,
results.description:
UNFRAMED

Live Laugh Love Don't Be A Dickhead Quote Prints

Do you know someone who gets annoyed by people?  Maybe a co worker or friend?  This funny, minimalistic but quirky quote print might be just the thing to make them laugh.

Available in either black and white or a range of colours (see colour chart in images).  This is ideal for those who love sarcastic quotes.


--------------------------------------------


❤ I am more than happy to discuss your order including colour and design options and offer any help or advice needed to get your print exactly how you would like it so please don't hesitate to get in touch ❤


❤ WANT IT FRAMED?
I offer framing for every print in my shop. Head over to the ‘Framed Prints’ section: 

https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/810319114/framed-live-laugh-love-dont-be-a?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1


❤ Browse the complete typography product range here:
http://bit.ly/minimalistprints


--------------------------------------------


❤ WHAT YOU GET:

- An unframed print. 

- I want your images to last a lifetime so I choose to print each image using genuine, highest quality inks onto professional quality, thick Lustre or Matte photo paper. 

This produces excellent image quality and longevity to protect precious memories so you can display your images with confidence, year after year.




--------------------------------------------


❤ PROCESSING & SHIPPING INFORMATION:

- I aim to dispatch all items within 3 working days (MON-FRI)

- As of January, 2020 all items, UK and International, are sent via Tracked & Signed post so that you can follow the progress of your item every step of the way.

- In a hurry? Express Postage Upgrades are available at checkout

- Want to send direct to the recipient? Please let me know and I will post it straight to them and include a complimentary gift note at no extra cost


*** Estimated Delivery Times ***

UK: 1-3 business days
EUROPE: 1-2 weeks 
USA: 2-4 weeks
CANADA: 2-4 weeks 
AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND, OCEANIA, ASIA PACIFIC: 2-5 weeks 


--------------------------------------------


❤ KEEP SHOPPING: https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/ThoughtfulKeepsakeCo


❤ Get 25% OFF your first order PLUS FREE PRINTABLE ART delivered to your inbox every month! LINK: http://bit.ly/freeartsignup



❤ WIN £50 TO SPEND AT THE THOUGHTFUL KEEPSAKE CO: 

Take a photo of your purchase - Share on Instagram with the #thoughtfulkeepsakeco. 
On the 1st of every month we‘ll pick our favourite & announce the winner via our Instagram page. GOOD LUCK!

results.title: Metal Love Sign - Metal Letters - Metal Wall Art - Live Laugh Love - Outdoor Decor - Home Decor - Word Art - Quote Set - Wall Art Metal
results.description:
Metal Love Sign - Metal Letters - Metal Wall Art - Live Laugh Love - Outdoor Decor - Home Decor - Word Art - Quote Set - Wall Art Metal - Family

Our Metal Love Sign, Metal Wall Art is made from 18 gauge steel sourced from the USA. Unlike vinyl wall hangings, our metal pieces are sturdy and made to last. No worry of peeling here! We powder coat our pieces in either black or a bronze color as shown. Powder coat creates a barrier around the metal that is stronger than paint and protects your piece from rusting. This allows you to display your Word Art or Quote Set as indoor home decor or outdoor decor. Listing photos of single words are shown with our bronze powder coat. 

Prefer the rustic look of a metal patina? We also offer the bare steel version which will rust/patina over time. The listing photo of set shows bare steel with natural patina. 

This piece is 8" tall by 20.5" wide.   

Have a color request? We can help with that! Please note that color requests are based on availability and may need extra time so we can order your special color for you. 

Like the sign but have a different size in mind? We can help you with that too. Just send us a message with your size requests and we will get back to you with a new price for your piece. 

We also offer "LIVE" (8"x19.5") and "LAUGH" (8"x25"), save 20% when you purchase all 3 as a set! You can find the listing for the entire Quote Set here:



Have a look at some of our other work by clicking here:

https://www.etsy.com/shop/SeasideMetalDesign

Shipping:

We use USPS calculated rates. Sometimes using a different carrier may be more economical for customers on the west coast. If USPS shipping rates seem extraordinary, please contact us so we can get you a quote through a different carrier.

If overages in shipping fees are collected, we will refund shipping if the overage exceeds $2.
